We amani have our own traditions and tests. It's expected of every warrior to earn the title of frostclaw by hunting a murderous beast.

I was unlucky enough to draw the {@LinkCreature:34#920#frostguard patriarch} as my target. I fear nothing, but I won't throw my life away.

If I had its claw, the test would be over and we could fight wendigos. Will you help me?

A mugato claw. So simple and yet it carries so much weight.

I owe you a debt of blood, . Or, a roast pigling if we ever meet in Kaiator! Hah!
I cannot beg. It's against my nature. Kaia does not love it.
